Name: Pousse-Café
Ingredients: 7.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
7.5 ml Giffard Peppermint Pastille crème de menthe
Instructions: LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring ingredients in the order listed.
Review: The amount of sugar in each liqueur and their temperature will impact their specific gravity and so how successfully they layer. This is more a test of patience and a steady hand than a drink.
History: A pousse-café is now a term for any multi-layered cocktail. The term originally seems to have been a general term for a mixture of liqueurs and/or spirits served after dinner, and most probably originated in France.
